oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: The World's Premier Blues Address
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Thomas, Rufus;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Two color window card (blue and red on white) announcing the World's Premier Blues Address 6th Anniversary Bash featuring Charlie Mussellwhite, Rufus Thomas, Anson and the Rockets, Eric Gales, The King Beez, Sid Selvidge, Ruby Wilson, Little Jimmy King, Preston Shannon, Reba Russell, Debbie Davies, and the Funn Brothers at B. B. King's Blues Clubs on June 9-15
